trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_SEQ_00<tab>Guthjon is still reeling from your miraculous find.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Magnus.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the chunk of leonine to Urianger.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Urianger.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_THANCRED_000_000<tab>I had hoped we would find leonine, but to find that particular specimen is nothing short of a miracle.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_GUTHJON_000_010<tab>I wouldn't believe it had I not seen it for myself.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_GUTHJON_000_011<tab>Before you set it in the Talos, would you take it to Magnus?
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_GUTHJON_000_012<tab>For three long years he's believed she died for nothing. He must know the truth─that her sacrifice was not in vain.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_THANCRED_000_013<tab>We'll take it straight to him. You have my word. Thank you, Guthjon, for all your help.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_THANCRED_000_014<tab>Right, then. Let's not keep everyone waiting.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_THANCRED_000_020<tab>Gods. What do we say?
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_GUTHJON_000_025<tab>I can only imagine the look on his face when he sees that.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_MAGNUS_000_030<tab>...What? Oh, it's you.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_MAGNUS_000_031<tab>If you've come to complain about the trolley, you'll find no sympathy from me. I told you before it won't run, and you wouldn't listen.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_THANCRED_000_032<tab>Oh, but it will. Now that we have this.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_THANCRED_000_033<tab>Your name is engraved on it, along with your son's. It was a gift from your wife, Magnus. From Agna.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_MAGNUS_000_034<tab>No... No, she couldn't have...
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_MAGNUS_000_035<tab>Agna...
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_MAGNUS_000_036<tab>Take it. Do with it what you will.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_THANCRED_000_037<tab>Are you certain? It would delay our plans, but─
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_MAGNUS_000_038<tab>I said take it. It was you who found it, you who needs it.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_MAGNUS_000_039<tab>Looking at that stone, all I can see is...is...
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_MAGNUS_000_040<tab>Please, just leave me be.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_THANCRED_000_041<tab>I hope you'll be there when the Talos stirs to life.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_THANCRED_000_042<tab>I'm sure she'd want you to see it.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_THANCRED_000_043<tab>Would you do the honors of delivering this to Urianger?
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_THANCRED_000_050<tab>Finally we can move on to Nabaath Areng. Assuming this works, of course.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_RYNE_000_055<tab>Sorry I couldn't be of more help. By the sounds of it, you have a knack for handling strange requests.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_RYNE_000_056<tab>On the bright side, Urianger taught me a lot about the Talos and their hearts. I think I can help if they need further repairs.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_THAFFE_000_060<tab>You what!? By the gods, I didn't think it possible.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_JERYK_000_065<tab>You found leonine? Truly? Then what are we waiting for─let's get that trolley moving!
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_MAGNUS_000_070<tab>Hmmm...
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_URIANGER_000_080<tab>Thou art returned, and with leonine it would seem.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_URIANGER_000_081<tab>As promised, the Talos hath been made ready to receive its heart, thanks in no small part to Jeryk, Thaffe, and Minfilia.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_URIANGER_000_082<tab>At last we shall return time to the timeless, this sentinel of stone, that we may press on towards Nabaath Areng.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_URIANGER_000_083<tab>Very good. Now, let us begin.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_THANCRED_000_090<tab>I only want what's best for her. If only she could see that...
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_RYNE_000_095<tab><sniff> I'm fine. Really. It's just been a long day.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_MAGNUS_000_100<tab>I must confess you've impressed me. I did not expect the Talos to be in such fine condition.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_THAFFE_000_105<tab>You've done us a kindness far greater than anything we deserve. Thank you. Thank you so much.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_JERYK_000_110<tab>Just thinking about the trolley running down the tracks, gears churning─gods, I can't stop smiling!
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_URIANGER_000_120<tab>Mine apologies for the delay. Minfilia and I had a private matter to discuss.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_URIANGER_000_121<tab>Which bringeth me to the question─how didst thou find Thancred during your search?
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_URIANGER_000_122<tab>He spoke of Minfilia? Of his own accord? I see...
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_URIANGER_000_123<tab>'Tis well that he did, and with such candor.

TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_URIANGER_000_124<tab>I attempted to broach the subject before. Mine intention was to ensure no words remained unspoken between them, lest tragedy intercede. A regret I myself know all too well. Alas, in the end he refused to heed my counsel.
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_URIANGER_000_125<tab>A time will come when they must face the reality of their circumstances. But I have faith that all will be well in time...
TEXT_LUCKMD113_03618_URIANGER_000_126<tab>Now, let us not tarry any longer. The Talos and Nabaath Areng await.
